Code Keeper Bot
  • 专 转注 - Code Keeper Bot
  • View page source

专 转注 - Code Keeper Bot

住拽专 转

专 转 爪转 专转 转注 砖 驻专拽 爪专 驻转.

砖: 转 转注 注 fail_on_warning: true (RTD) CI 注 -W --keep-going. 砖 注 专转. 注 住拽专 驻驻 (api, database, handlers, services, configuration) 砖 砖转砖 :noindex: 注 驻转 拽住. 爪 autodoc_mock_imports 注 拽专住转 build.

专爪 转 vs 转

转 砖

拽专专

专爪 转

专爪 转

转 砖转砖

驻转 拽

Production

转专转

驻 专砖

push/merge

砖

拽

CI/CD

转

2-5 拽转

注拽转

转 驻转

转

驻专住

爪: 砖 砖转

graph TD
    A[拽 砖] --> B{驻?}
    B -->|拽| C[专爪 转]
    B -->|Feature Branch| D[CI - 拽 ]
    B -->|Main Branch| E[CI -  + 驻专住]
    C --> F[拽转 转注]
    D --> G[PR Review]
    E --> H[GitHub Pages/Read the Docs]

专转 专爪 转

1. 住拽专驻 拽 专

#!/bin/bash
# build_docs_local.sh

echo " Building documentation locally..."

# 拽转 转转
if ! command -v sphinx-build &> /dev/null; then
    echo " Installing Sphinx..."
    pip install sphinx sphinx-rtd-theme sphinx-autodoc-typehints sphinxcontrib-napoleon
fi

# 转 转注
cd docs
make clean
make html

# 驻转 驻驻 (驻爪)
if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "darwin"* ]]; then
    open _build/html/index.html
elif [[ "$OSTYPE" == "linux-gnu"* ]]; then
    xdg-open _build/html/index.html
fi

echo " Documentation ready at docs/_build/html/index.html"

2. Pre-commit Hook

# .git/hooks/pre-commit
#!/bin/bash

echo " Checking documentation..."

# 拽转 docstrings
python -m pydocstyle --count

# 转 转注 拽
cd docs && make html > /dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo " Documentation build failed!"
    exit 1
fi

echo " Documentation check passed"

专转 专爪 转

1. GitHub Actions - 驻专住

# .github/workflows/documentation.yml
name: Documentation

on:
  push:
    branches: [main, develop]
    paths:
      - '**.py'
      - 'docs/**'
      - 'requirements.txt'
  pull_request:
    branches: [main]
    paths:
      - '**.py'
      - 'docs/**'
  release:
    types: [published]
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  build-docs:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - name:  Checkout code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      with:
        fetch-depth: 0  # Full history for git info
    
    - name:  Setup Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4
      with:
        python-version: '3.9'
        cache: 'pip'
    
    - name:  Install dependencies
      run: |
        pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install sphinx sphinx-rtd-theme sphinx-autodoc-typehints sphinxcontrib-napoleon
        # Install project dependencies for autodoc
        pip install -r requirements.txt || true
    
    - name:  Build documentation
      run: |
        cd docs
        sphinx-build -b html . _build/html -W --keep-going
      env:
        SPHINX_MOCK_IMPORTS: true
    
    - name:  Generate coverage report
      if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
      run: |
        cd docs
        sphinx-build -b coverage . _build/coverage
        cat _build/coverage/python.txt
    
    - name:  Upload artifacts
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
      with:
        name: documentation
        path: docs/_build/html/
        retention-days: 7
    
    - name:  Deploy to GitHub Pages
      if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/main' && github.event_name == 'push'
      uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
      with:
        github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        publish_dir: ./docs/_build/html
        cname: docs.your-domain.com  # 驻爪
        force_orphan: true
    
    - name:  Comment on PR
      if: github.event_name == 'pull_request'
      uses: actions/github-script@v6
      with:
        script: |
          github.rest.issues.createComment({
            issue_number: context.issue.number,
            owner: context.repo.owner,
            repo: context.repo.repo,
            body: ' Documentation preview is ready! Check the artifacts.'
          })

2. Read the Docs - 专转

# .readthedocs.yml
version: 2

sphinx:
  configuration: docs/conf.py
  fail_on_warning: true

formats:
  - pdf
  - epub
  - htmlzip

python:
  version: "3.9"
  install:
    - requirements: requirements.txt
    - requirements: docs/requirements.txt
    - method: pip
      path: .

build:
  os: ubuntu-22.04
  tools:
    python: "3.9"
  jobs:
    pre_build:
      - echo "Running pre-build commands"
      - python --version
    post_build:
      - echo "Build complete!"

3. GitLab CI - 专转

# .gitlab-ci.yml
stages:
  - test
  - build
  - deploy

variables:
  PIP_CACHE_DIR: "$CI_PROJECT_DIR/.cache/pip"

cache:
  paths:
    - .cache/pip
    - docs/_build

test-docs:
  stage: test
  image: python:3.9
  script:
    - pip install sphinx sphinx-rtd-theme
    - cd docs
    - sphinx-build -b html . _build/html -W
  except:
    - tags

build-docs:
  stage: build
  image: python:3.9
  script:
    - pip install -r requirements.txt
    - cd docs
    - make clean
    - make html
  artifacts:
    paths:
      - docs/_build/html
    expire_in: 1 week
  only:
    - main
    - develop

pages:
  stage: deploy
  dependencies:
    - build-docs
  script:
    - mkdir -p public
    - cp -r docs/_build/html/* public/
  artifacts:
    paths:
      - public
  only:
    - main

Best Practices

1. Docstring Standards

def example_function(param1: str, param2: int = 10) -> dict:
    """
    转专 拽爪专 转爪转 砖 驻拽爪.
    
    转专 驻专 转专 砖住专 转 拽,
    砖砖 转 砖 驻拽爪.
    
    Args:
        param1: 转专 驻专专 专砖
        param2: 转专 驻专专 砖. 专专转 : 10
    
    Returns:
        dict:  注 驻转转 :
            - 'status': 住住 驻注
            - 'data': 转 砖专
    
    Raises:
        ValueError:  param1 专拽
        TypeError:  param2  住驻专
    
    Example:
        >>> result = example_function("test", 20)
        >>> print(result['status'])
        'success'
    
    Note:
        驻拽爪  专砖转 专 专
    
    Warning:
         砖砖 注 转 专砖
    
    See Also:
        :func:`related_function`: 驻拽爪 拽砖专
        :class:`RelatedClass`: 拽 拽砖专
    """
    pass

2. 转拽转 抓

docs/
 _static/           # 拽爪 住 (CSS, JS, 转转)
    custom.css
    logo.png
 _templates/        # 转转 转转
    layout.html
 api/              # 转注 API 
    index.rst
    modules.rst
 guides/           # 专
    quickstart.rst
    installation.rst
    configuration.rst
 examples/         # 转 拽
    basic.rst
    advanced.rst
 conf.py           # 专转 Sphinx
 index.rst         # 祝 转
 Makefile          # 驻拽转 
 requirements.txt  # 转转 转注

3. 专转 Sphinx 爪转

# docs/conf.py - 转住驻转 爪转

# -- Extension configuration -------------------------------------------------

# Napoleon settings
napoleon_google_docstring = True
napoleon_numpy_docstring = True
napoleon_include_init_with_doc = True
napoleon_include_private_with_doc = False
napoleon_include_special_with_doc = True
napoleon_use_admonition_for_examples = True
napoleon_use_admonition_for_notes = True
napoleon_use_admonition_for_references = True
napoleon_use_ivar = False
napoleon_use_param = True
napoleon_use_rtype = True
napoleon_type_aliases = {
    'DataFrame': 'pandas.DataFrame',
    'Series': 'pandas.Series',
    'ndarray': 'numpy.ndarray',
}

# Autodoc settings
autodoc_default_options = {
    'members': True,
    'member-order': 'bysource',
    'special-members': '__init__',
    'undoc-members': True,
    'exclude-members': '__weakref__',
    'show-inheritance': True,
    'inherited-members': True,
    'private-members': False,
}

# Mock imports for CI/CD
autodoc_mock_imports = [
    'pymongo', 'motor', 'bson',
    'fuzzywuzzy', 'python_levenshtein', 'Levenshtein',
    'redis', 'aioredis', 'celery', 'psutil', 'sentry_sdk',
    'flask', 'uvicorn', 'gunicorn', 'telegram', 'telegram.ext', 'telegram.constants', 'telegram.error',
    'google', 'googleapiclient', 'googleapiclient.discovery', 'google.oauth2',
    'github', 'PyGithub',
    'cairosvg', 'aiohttp', 'textstat', 'langdetect', 'pytest', 'search_engine', 'code_processor', 'integrations',
]

# Intersphinx - 拽砖专 转注 爪
intersphinx_mapping = {
    'python': ('https://docs.python.org/3', None),
    'telegram': ('https://docs.python-telegram-bot.org/en/stable/', None),
    'pymongo': ('https://pymongo.readthedocs.io/en/stable/', None),
    'redis': ('https://redis-py.readthedocs.io/en/stable/', None),
}

# Todo extension
todo_include_todos = True
todo_emit_warnings = True

# Coverage settings
coverage_ignore_modules = [
    'tests.*',
    'test_*',
]

coverage_ignore_functions = [
    'main',
    '__main__',
]

coverage_ignore_classes = [
    'Meta',
]

# Linkcheck
linkcheck_ignore = [
    r'http://localhost:\d+/',
    r'https://t.me/.*',
]

linkcheck_timeout = 10

转 注 抓

Development Workflow

graph LR
    A[转转 拽] --> B[住驻转 Docstrings]
    B --> C[专爪 转 拽转]
    C --> D{转注 转拽?}
    D -->|| B
    D -->|| E[Commit + Push]
    E --> F[CI 拽 转注]
    F --> G{注专 拽转?}
    G -->|| H[转拽]
    G -->|| I[Merge to Main]
    I --> J[驻专住 ]

抓

  • : 专爪 转 驻转

  • PR: 拽 转

  • Merge: 转

  • Release: 驻专住 专住 转转

  • 砖注: 拽转 拽砖专 砖专

  • 砖: 住拽专转 coverage

驻 注转 驻爪转

1. Import Errors 转注

# docs/conf.py
autodoc_mock_imports = ['problematic_module']

2. 转注 转注

# 拽 cache
cd docs
make clean
rm -rf _build
make html

3. GitHub Pages 转注

# 拽 专转 Repository
Settings > Pages > Source: gh-pages branch

4. Read the Docs 砖

# .readthedocs.yml
python:
  install:
    - requirements: docs/requirements-docs.txt

专拽转 专

KPIs 转注

  • Coverage: > 80% 驻拽爪转 转注转

  • Build Time: < 5 拽转

  • Broken Links: 0

  • Warning Count: < 10

  • Page Load Time: < 2 砖转

专 

# .github/workflows/docs-metrics.yml
name: Documentation Metrics

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 0 * * 0'  # Weekly

jobs:
  metrics:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
      - name: Check documentation coverage
        run: |
          cd docs
          sphinx-build -b coverage . _build/coverage
          python -c "
          with open('_build/coverage/python.txt') as f:
              content = f.read()
              if 'Undocumented' in content:
                  print('锔 Found undocumented items!')
                  print(content)
          "
      
      - name: Check for broken links
        run: |
          cd docs
          sphinx-build -b linkcheck . _build/linkcheck
